attributes.action: Church of Beard to become a recognised religion.
attributes.additional_details:
A group, a sect, a religion, a charitable organisation that is accepting of other beliefs and paths of life.
It is an acceptance, a love of not just facial hair, but a time when some view it as a time when a person reaches adulthood and can take their first steps into the world to make a difference.
We, as a people, wish to make a difference to the world by encouraging those with no belief or path in life, to join us with something concrete that they can visualise and believe in and help them acheive the goals they wish to complete in life.
